comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: The Hellig Olav had a tonnage of 10.085 tons gross, 6.506 under deck and 6.061 tons net. Dimensions: 500.8 feet long, 58.3 feet beam (152,63m x beam 17,77m) and holds 29.2 feet deep. lots of info here www.norwayheritage.com/p_ship.asp?sh=helol

comment.author: 61415649@N04
comment._content: a classic liner of old, indeed! mrdot.
